upload.title: Upload Image
upload.support: Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP and more

tips.noMask: Please mark the area to remove first

aiPowered.title: Smart Technology
aiPowered.desc: Advanced image processing technology to intelligently identify and remove watermarks

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.desc: No professional skills required, mark with brush and process quickly

privacy.title: Privacy Protected
privacy.desc: Images are only processed temporarily, not stored or used for other purposes

highQuality.title: High Quality Output
highQuality.desc: Maintains original image quality with natural and seamless results

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Select or drag the image you want to process

step2.title: Mark Watermark
step2.desc: Use brush to mark the watermark area to remove

step3.title: Download Result
step3.desc: Click process button, wait for completion and download
